law.catch_line: License, licensed social worker -- Requirements -- Issuance.

text.section: The license shall be displayed in the licensee's principal place of practice, and shall entitle the licensee to hold himself forth to the public as providing services as authorized by KRS 335.010 to 335.160 and 335.990.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 26, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 28, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 305, sec. 3. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 279, sec. 9.
